body_html: @yifeif that would be awesome! I didn't realize saved_model_cli was already installed directly. Maybe a tftools ... interface is a bit overkill, but at a certain point having a unified way to call these utilities might be worth looking into. I think freeze_graph is used enough to be worth the extra effort.

body: @yifeif that would be awesome! I didn't realize `saved_model_cli` was already installed directly. Maybe a `tftools ...` interface is a bit overkill, but at a certain point having a unified way to call these utilities might be worth looking into. I think `freeze_graph` is used enough to be worth the extra effort.
